channel.title: Greek Statistician on Tristan Berchoux
channel.description: Recent content in Greek Statistician on Tristan Berchoux

item.title: Sunday Data/Statistics Link Roundup (2/5)
item.description: Cool app, you can write out an equation on the screen and it translates the equation to latex. Via Andrew G. Yet another D3 tutorial. Stay tuned for some cool stuff on this front here at Simply Stats in the near future. Via Vishal. Our favorite Greek statistician in the news again.Â How measurement of academic output harms science. Related: is submitting scientific papers too time consuming? Stay tuned for more on this topic this week.
